org.jboss.gravia.resource

Interface Resource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Adaptable, Attachable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResource, DefaultResource

    public interface Resource
extends Adaptable, Attachable
    A resource is associated with Capabilities/Requirements.

    02-Jul-2010
    Author:
